lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Tuesday about the Giants’ overtime victory against the Carolina Panthers on Sunday night attributed an erroneous distinction to a formidable Giants opponent in December 2007, the New England Patriots. They were undefeated at that point of the regular season — not the defending Super Bowl champions, a title belonging to the Indianapolis Colts.
